Fact-checkers have traced the origin of the claim to an inaccurate interpretation of Bill Gates' comments, which were further amplified by Roger Stone, a longtime ally of President Donald Trump. Stone suggested that Gates and other globalists are using the pandemic to enforce mandatory vaccinations and microchipping individuals, but there is no evidence supporting this assertion.
